name: argo-cd
description: Declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes
values:
# ArgoCD configuration
# Ref: https://github.com/argoproj/argo-helm/blob/main/charts/argo-cd/values.yaml

## ArgoCD configuration
## Global settings
global:
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: argoproj/argocd
    tag: "v3.1.8"

## Server configuration
server:
  name: server
  image: {}
  replicas: 1
  service:
    type: ClusterIP
    port: 8080
    targetPort: 8080
  ingress:
    enabled: false

## Redis configuration
redis:
  enabled: true
  name: redis
  image:
    registry: public.ecr.aws
    repository: docker/library/redis
    tag: 7.2-alpine

## Application controller configuration
applicationSet:
  enabled: true
  image:
    registry: quay.io
    repository: argoproj/applicationset
    tag: "v1.13.0"

dex:
  enabled: true
  name: dex-server
  image:
    registry: ghcr.io
    repository: dexidp/dex
    tag: "v2.40.0"

configs:
  # Admin user initial password
  secret:
    createSecret: true
    # argocdServerAdminPassword: ""
    # argocdServerAdminPasswordMtime: ""
